page.title: 03THE VICAR OF GILLING WEST
page.content: The vicar of{Gilling}also looks after the parishes of{Kirby Ravensworth}and {Melsonby.} He does not just take services in church, but comforts families who have lost loved ones and prays for them. He visits the sick and elderly both at home and in hospital. He also meets with other clergy and prepares services.There are two main services each Sunday,{Holy Commumion }and {Evensong. Family Service}takes place once a month and replaces Communion. In a Family service we sing a song and say a prayer. The vicar then tells a Bible story and shows pictures. He talks about{Jesus}and reads from the {Bible.}We then say a prayer and sing another song. One of the children takes the collection and the service closes with the vicar saying the {Benediction.}
